sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing a king of hearts from a deck of 52 cards if you draw one card at random?
message_2:
There is only 1 King of Hearts in a standard deck of 52 cards. So, the probability of drawing a King of Hearts from a deck of 52 cards when drawing one card at random is:

1 (King of Hearts) / 52 (total cards) = 1/52

The probability is 1/52 or approximately 0.0192 or 1.92%.
